pkgmetadata.longdescription: # CustomGPT SDK## UsageFirst, create a client:```pythonfrom customgpt_client import CustomGPTCustomGPT.api_key="SuperSecretToken"```Now you can access to all of our Models:Example Request will be like this:Creating a Project synchronously:```pythonresponse = CustomGPT.Project.create(project_name='Test', sitemap_path='https://example.com/test.xml', file_data_retension=False, file=file)project_id = response.data.id```Or do the same thing with an async version:```pythonresponse = await CustomGPT.Project.acreate(project_name='Test', sitemap_path='https://example.com/test.xml', file_data_retension=False, file=file)project_id = response.data.id```
